website_summaries.verdict: A quick and easy liquid mix that tastes homemade
pros: All you need is milk and heavy cream to whip up this tasty vanilla ice cream mix
It works with a variety of different ice cream machines, from mechanic to manual
Will of course work in a soft-serve machine
The vanilla is nice and creamy and ready to serve in a short period of time
Many users recommend Nostalgia for parties
cons: A few users found the mixture too sweet

website_summaries.verdict: Creamy and easy French vanilla ice cream mix that tastes like you made it from scratch.
pros: Great starter kit for simple vanilla ice cream
Works with all ice cream makers, including buckets and gel canisters
cons: Vanilla taste not quite right for a small minority of reviewers

customer_reviews.title: Taste like marshmellow; sticky
customer_reviews.text: Taste like marshmellow; sticky. The grandkids said "Gramma's ice cream is like edible slime." Not a compliment. Wasted milk and cream. Kids ate a little, threw most out. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: lib1

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best vanilla ice cream made at home you’ll ever try!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this ice cream mix. It’s so good it tastes like frozen marshmallow. My daughter loves it. Very good, but it has to be used with an ice cream maker and instructions must be followed because at first, I thought this was just sugar in a bag because i fist tried to make it with skim milk and it tasted horrible, but the secret is in the heavy cream. I made mine with a little bit of evaporated milk to make up the two cups of regular milk. Well, needless to say, it came out DELICIOUS :). Thank you Nostalgia <3
customer_reviews.author: Emills

customer_reviews.title: Tastes fantastic and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is so good and easy! I bought my first pk at another store and wasn't sure it would work ok. The package says only pt half in your ice cream freezer, but I have the kitchen aid and filled it up a little higher. It worked fine and was a softer consistency which I like better. I think it's tastes similar to Dairy Queen and a only 70 calories. It's very easy to mix, just uses whipping cream and milk so bought a box of them. Only wish it came in chocolate also. Will buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie L. Kury

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: This product is so easy to use and the taste is great. I like that it tastes so close to homemade, from scratch ice cream. I have a smaller ice cream maker so I have to use half a packet of mix, but that is OK. I have added blueberries, chocolate, peanut butter... so great!
customer_reviews.author: just shopping

customer_reviews.title: Very sweet sugary taste...not good if you expect Vanilla
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely not a Vanilla if that is what you are looking for. I didn't understand the Vanilla Cream name meant it would taste very very sweet without a Vanilla flavor. What vanilla flavor you might expect is overpowered by the sugary sweet main taste.
customer_reviews.author: R. Fairchild

customer_reviews.title: So easy ... and yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to follow instructions, great recipes, and the finished product is delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Lipstickgirl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use grape flavor just know it’s very sweet
customer_reviews.text: Great little packets make it very easy to use our new electric ice cream making machine just be aware that the results are very very sweet ice cream
customer_reviews.author: Jack Price

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the time or the money.
customer_reviews.text: The ice cream was gooey and more like marshmallow then ice cream. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Terryanne Gremel

customer_reviews.title: Taste okay and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Taste okay and easy to use. Can get it cheaper at Wal-Mart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think I’m doing something wrong
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried to make ice cream with this mix several times and each time it never thickens up. It’s always like a runny frosty from Wendy’s (which doesn’t taste bad) maybe I’m doing something wrong but I following the directions....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Taste like  fluffy/whipped Icecream.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 8 pack off here and they are horrible. It definitely taste like a marshmallow/whipped icecream. I even tried to mix with oreos but the consistency is terrible :( Now i am stuck with a bunch of packets i wont use.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great ice cream
customer_reviews.text: I love making homemade ice cream. These packs make great tasting ice cream and allow me to add flavors as I please.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Ice Cream
customer_reviews.text: Very Easy to make and the flavor is wonderful. You get really good HOMEMADE Ice Cream with very little work or effort.
customer_reviews.author: William Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: I like the taste of the ice cream mix
customer_reviews.text: I like the taste of the ice cream mix, and I liked the price, but I noticed the price went up about ten dollars...but I will buy more...Thank you for a good product...Ken Hall
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth hall

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TASTING AND EASY TO MAKE.
customer_reviews.text: This Ice Cream Mix is exactly what I was looking for. It works great in my ice cream mixer and tastes great also.
customer_reviews.author: GeoK

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have used one package but it is great. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Roy E. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Product was on time and easy to use. Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweet not Vanilla
customer_reviews.text: I had to add vanilla extract without it the flavor is very weak and it just tastes sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Coslina

customer_reviews.title: Used to make ice cream this past weekend and loved the flavor and how easy it was to use
customer_reviews.text: Used to make ice cream this past weekend and loved the flavor and how easy it was to use.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Defected?
customer_reviews.text: None of the packages will freeze. Just runny cream.. ran for 2 hrs
customer_reviews.author: Sandra barnard

customer_reviews.title: Simple, quick quart o ice cream. Enjoying a ...
customer_reviews.text: Simple, quick quart o ice cream. Enjoying a bowl after 20 minutes, unlike the 1 - 2 hours for the 100% from scratch recipes and it tastes the same!
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Wunderlich

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure it is good.
customer_reviews.text: We got these for our married children. So far they haven't shared with me. I'm sure it is good.
customer_reviews.author: CHEVIT

customer_reviews.title: sad!
customer_reviews.text: does not even taste like good ol home made ice cream
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgia ICP825CHOC8PK Premium Chocolate Ice Cream Mix, 8 (8-Ounce) Packs, Makes 16 Quarts Total
customer_reviews.text: WOW...WOW...WOW! This Ice Cream Is Extremely TASTY! 😋MG! Very simple instructions... - 2 cups of milk, 2 cups of Heavy Cream...Per Package! We are always fully stocked with this stuff, all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Love our homemade ice cream in the summer. Works great in our cuisinart ice cream maker.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine01

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Works great in our soft serve ice cream machine and the great-grandchildren love it. So do I
customer_reviews.author: Dennis L Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Great Ice Cream Mix
customer_reviews.text: Easy to follow directions. Makes really good Chocolate Ice Cream. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic ice cream mix
customer_reviews.text: We love this product. It is some of the best vanilla ice cream we have ever tasted.
customer_reviews.author: Dian griffin

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: I liked it all. It was easy to use and made making ice cream easier to make.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Pernell

customer_reviews.title: "Delivered" But have not received it. Stolen? Ahrrr...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Reordered numerous times. This time it must have been stolen (?) from being devived outside the front gate (?)
customer_reviews.author: thomas

customer_reviews.title: I scream, u scream we all scream for I e cream and this is great!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this add some berry's and you have an amazing ucsc incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Stroop dogg

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Delish
customer_reviews.text: The ice cream was delicious and sooo easy to make using the mix. The only other ingredients needed with the mix are milk and heavy cream👍😃!!️
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: Blends well, excellent texture when frozen or as soft serve. Add fruit with great results.
customer_reviews.author: Blf

customer_reviews.title: Quick shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Taste great, we added some blackberries we picked and was excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Randy Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy  again
customer_reviews.text: Total waste of money tasted like cheap old soft serv icecream
customer_reviews.author: blue goose

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the ice cream mix as a gift for my daughter in law who loves vanilla ice cream!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy N

customer_reviews.title: was way too sweet; added strawberries the second time and more liquid
customer_reviews.text: was way too sweet; added strawberries the second time and more liquid, tasted better, but still sweet for me.
customer_reviews.author: polson

product_meta.title: Nostalgia ICP825VAN8PK Premium Vanilla Creme Ice Cream Mix, 8 oz) Pack, Makes 16 quart Total
product_meta.description: Style:VanilliaMake delicious homemade ice cream with all Nostalgia and other quality ice cream makers! Simply combine mix with milk and heavy cream, and fill your ice cream canister - churn and enjoy! Makes 2 quarts.
feature_bullets: Includes 8 individual packets of high quality ice cream mix, makes 16 quarts total
Each packet makes 2 quarts of premium French vanilla ice cream
Just add milk and heavy cream for delicious old fashioned ice cream
Works with all ice cream makers – including ice cream buckets and gel canister ice cream makers
